entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023
